pages.text: Temperoceras was an orthoconic nautiloid from Afroeurasia during the Ordovician to Devonian periods. Its shell had a tubular siphuncle and was much thinner than other larger orthocones. It probably lived like other orthocones, as an ambush hunter.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Kill for Egg/Bucket
